help.entry:
"DISPEL GOOD"
Usage : cast 'dispel good' <victim> Accumulative: - Duration : Instantaneous Level : Cleric level 14. Save : Special
This spell will only affect good creatures. A good person of level equal or less than caster will suffer 100 damage points.
If the victim is higher level than caster, the spell will inflict (caster_level)d4 damage points, saving throw versus half damage.
See also: DISPEL EVIL
